Be One Step Ahead in Hiring

May 1, 2019
Industry Trends, Recruiting Strategies, Recruitment

In today’s hiring environment, you need to have every advantage that you can get. With unemployment sitting at historic lows, competition for talent is at extreme. Hiring managers must act aggressively before someone else will snatches talent away.

Sorting through applications, screening applicants, and waiting to hear back from department heads takes valuable time away from recruiters.

Recruiting technology enhances the hiring process by:

  • Organizing
  • Tracking
  • Targeting
  • Non-Bias
  • Ease-of-use

With the help of tech in recruitment, you’re now able to manage more tasks in less time and be more productive at work. Here’s the latest in tech trends to help you in your hiring process.

Current update in Recruitment Management Systems

Some recruiters today can’t comprehend the way of recruiting back in the 90s. Back in days, we were relying on newspapers and magazines? Today, 73% ATS are getting use by top recruiting companies Tracking applicant is becoming big trade and continues to see new updates and latest computer applications. Today, ATS and CRM tools offer latest on boarding experiences for consultants, the ability to form quadrant style matrix, plots to differentiate top performers. Different functionality of particular App will help to perform specific task such as scheduling emails to potential candidate for the desired job role

Resume screening software

There are some Pros and Cons in Resume screening Applications, but here the pros far outweigh the cons. There are chances that you might miss the most desirable profile in the rough, However, you are likely to review more qualified consultants’ applications that certainly give you an edge to fill the need of the client.

Remember, Time is money, we are going after the same person in this candidate-driven market. Having quicker access will certainly give you an advantage to filter out the right candidate.

Candidate Recruitment and Marketing

Recruiting the right candidate and deliver it to the client require deep understanding about the job responsibilities and the client. It accomplishes the following four commodities with candidates:

  • Building trust
  • Provides insight knowledge
  • Nurtures relationships
  • Generating Leads
  • Marketing

Having this tool-set in your collection gives your company an edge to the competition. And with all in one marketing platforms such as HubSpot, Booker, or GoSquared, Google AdWords, Bing Ads, you can set up email newsletters, blog, social media marketing, and SEO among others.
